content.description: Refer to the following slides. The slide on the left shows a plan of the building on the right.
content.question: The building combines

choices.label: a basilican plan with a central plan
a double transept with a dome
a hypostyle hall and an atrium

content.answer: a basilican plan with a central plan

unit.text: 3: Early Europe and Colonial Americas, 200 - 1750 CE

topic.text: 3.4: Purpose and Audience in Early European and Colonial American Art

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Describe visual elements of a work of art (or group of related works of art), including-  a. form.  b. style.  c. materials.  d. technique.  e. content.
